dict.string: Brisk five-minute warmup walk, then jog 3.6km (or 25 minutes) with no walking.

Gym Workouts: 60 - 90 sec rest between sets
1. Squats: Reps - 10,12 for 2 sets 2. Leg Curls: Reps 12 for 1 set 3. Calf Raises: Reps - 12, 15 for 2 sets 4. Bench Press: Reps - 10,12 for 2 sets 5. Pulldowns: Reps - 10,12 for 2 sets 6. Cable Rows: Reps - 10,12 for 2 sets 7. Overhead Press: Reps - 10,12 for 2 sets

Bodyweight Exercise: 60 sec rest between sets
1. Static Birddog Hold 10x - 3 sets 2. Static Deadbugs Hold 15x - 3 sets 3. Squats 8x - 2 sets 4. Glute Bridges 10x - 2 sets 5. Rows/Reverse Push-ups 12x - 2 sets 6. Push-ups 12x - 2 sets

Gym Workouts: 60 - 90 sec rest between sets
1. Squats: Reps - 10,12 for 2 sets 2. Leg Curls: Reps 12 for 1 set 3. Calf Raises: Reps - 12, 15 for 2 sets 4. Bench Press: Reps - 10,12 for 2 sets 5. Pulldowns: Reps - 10,12 for 2 sets 6. Cable Rows: Reps - 10,12 for 2 sets 7. Overhead Press: Reps - 10,12 for 2 sets
